## Private Member Functions

### extend() {#a485ccf00cca04710ba96f038d166de65}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned SuffixTree::extend (unsigned EndIdx, unsigned SuffixesToAdd)">
Construct the suffix tree for the prefix of the input ending at <code>EndIdx</code>.

Used to construct the full suffix tree iteratively. At the end of each step, the constructed suffix tree is either a valid suffix tree, or a suffix tree with implicit suffixes. At the end of the final step, the suffix tree is a valid tree.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="EndIdx">The end index of the current prefix in the main string.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="SuffixesToAdd">The number of suffixes that must be added to complete the suffix tree at the current phase.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
The number of suffixes that have not been added at the end of this step.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h/#l00134">134</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h">SuffixTree.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/suffixtree-cpp/#l00179">179</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/suffixtree-cpp">SuffixTree.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insertInternalNode() {#a987cc15249f7b760c0abe7cfa747e079}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SuffixTreeInternalNode &#42; SuffixTree::insertInternalNode (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode">SuffixTreeInternalNode</a> &#42; Parent, unsigned StartIdx, unsigned EndIdx, unsigned Edge)</>}>
Allocate an internal node and add it to the tree.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Parent">The parent of this node. Only null when allocating the root.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="StartIdx">The start index of this node&#39;s associated string.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="EndIdx">The end index of this node&#39;s associated string.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Edge">The label on the edge leaving <code>Parent</code> to this node.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
A pointer to the allocated internal node.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h/#l00107">107</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h">SuffixTree.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/suffixtree-cpp/#l00068">68</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/suffixtree-cpp">SuffixTree.cpp</a>.

</MemberDefinition>

### setLeafNodes() {#a5201fe4e74dbfafb4dd87b9d7fba325e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void SuffixTree::setLeafNodes ()">
Perform a post-order depth-first traversal of the tree and perform two tasks during the traversal.

The first is to populate LeafNodes, adding nodes in order of the traversal. The second is to keep track of the leaf descendants of every internal node by assigning values to LeftLeafIndex and RightLefIndex fields of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode">SuffixTreeNode</a> for all internal nodes.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h/#l00147">147</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h">SuffixTree.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/suffixtree-cpp/#l00115">115</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/suffixtree-cpp">SuffixTree.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### setSuffixIndices() {#a87b598d985a6a56011d6b4808cf951a8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void SuffixTree::setSuffixIndices ()">

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h/#l00118">118</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h">SuffixTree.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/suffixtree-cpp/#l00086">86</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/suffixtree-cpp">SuffixTree.cpp</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h/#l00061">61</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h">SuffixTree.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LeafNodes {#adadcf76beb8d18413c5f0e69c9aab090}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;SuffixTreeLeafNode &#42;&gt; llvm::SuffixTree::LeafNodes</>}>
This vector contains all leaf nodes of this suffix tree.

These leaf nodes are identified using post-order depth-first traversal, so that the order of these leaf nodes in the vector matches the order of the leaves in the tree from left to right if one were to draw the tree on paper.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h/#l00140">140</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h">SuffixTree.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Root {#adff03850e3057a6a44714f4590898d99}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SuffixTreeInternalNode&#42; llvm::SuffixTree::Root = nullptr</>}>
The root of the suffix tree.

The root represents the empty string. It is maintained by the <code>NodeAllocator</code> like every other node in the tree.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h/#l00067">67</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h">SuffixTree.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
